=== UGH! = Ubuntu Gaming Highlights ===

==== Introduction ====

This is a place to share '''"Ubuntu Gaming Highlights"''', the rapid presentations of great games that appear at Ubuntu Vancouver !LoCo General Meetings.

Your host '''Nathaniel''' (our resident expert on all things Ubuntu-gaming) leads the way and shows you what's great! Thank you Nathaniel for this great addition.

Randall.

=== Tech Used ===

* Initially the screen grabs (video) are done with ffmpeg 

ffmpeg -f x11grab -r 25 -s 1680x1050 -i :0.0 -vcodec ffv1 -sameq output-ugh.avi

The audio is routed to audacity

Then the video is cropped using avidmux and exported to a MP4 file

The audio and video are then imported into an openshot project
